Claim: "A man in a yellow shirt and blue pants balances himself on a log."
Implication: "Two men are standing on a log."
Referring expressions: A man, yellow shirt, blue pants, log  Two men, log
Formula: (exists c (exists d (exists a (IsInYellowShirt(c) and IsOnLog(a) and IsInBluePants(d)))) & (forall f (forall g ( AreStandingOn(f,g) ->   IsOnLog(g))))) -> (exists e (exists a (AreStandingOn(e,a))))
